title: The Secret Life of Adolf Hitler

sources.title: The Secret Life of Adolf Hitler
sources.description: Westbrook Van Vorhees narrates this 1958 television documentary about the nazi regime.

sources.title: The Secret Life of Adolf Hitler (1958)
sources.description: 1950's television documentary special that includes interviews with Hitler's sister Paula Wolf and a fellow prisoner who was incarcerated with Hitler, actual footage shot by the Nazi's and Eva Braun's rare home movies. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-secret-life-of-adolf-hitler-1958/

metadata.Plot: 1950's television documentary special that includes interviews with Hitler's sister Paula Wolf and a fellow prisoner who was incarcerated with Hitler, actual footage shot by the Nazi's and Eva Braun's rare home movies.
metadata.Actors: Westbrook Van Voorhis, Paula Wolf, Julius Schaub
